ingredients.ingredient: 1 cup light brown sugar, firmly packed

cookingTips: Line baking sheet with foil or parchment and spray lightly to prevent sticking
Bring toffee mixture to boil for 1-2 minutes after sugar dissolves for proper consistency
Spread toffee immediately after making, then top with chocolate while warm
enrichment.coachingPrompt: This simple yet elegant treat combines crispy matzo with buttery toffee and chocolate. Teach proper toffee-making technique and timing for even coating.
